infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This app needs location access for automatic attendance tracking when you enter or leave office premises.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app needs location access to track your attendance at office locations.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: This app needs background location access to automatically track your attendance even when the app is not active.

plugins.locationAlwaysPermission: Allow Attendance App to use your location even when the app is not active for automatic attendance tracking.
plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: Allow Attendance App to use your location for attendance tracking when you're using the app.
